name: HubSpot
natural_language_description: 这是 HubSpot 节点。主要用于: Consume HubSpot API

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: apiKey

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: deal

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create
available_options: Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many tickets

resolveData.name: resolveData
resolveData.description: By default the response only includes the ID. If this option gets activated, it will resolve the data automatically.
resolveData.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resolve Data | 作用: By default the response only includes the ID. If this option gets activated, it will resolve the data automatically. | 默认值: True

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: properties (值: None) - Used to include specific ticket properties in the results. By default, the results will only include ticket ID and will not include the values for any properties for your company.Including this parameter will include the data for the specified property in the results. You can include this parameter multiple times to request multiple properties separated by a comma: `,`.. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

propertiesWithHistory (值: None) - Works similarly to properties=, but this parameter will include the history for the specified property, instead of just including the current value. Use this parameter when you need the full history of changes to a property's value.

contactId.name: contactId
contactId.description: Unique identifier for a particular contact
contactId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Contact ID | 作用: Unique identifier for a particular contact | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: since (值: None) - Only return deals created after timestamp x

includePropertyVersions (值: None) - By default, you will only get data for the most recent version of a property in the "versions" data. If you include this parameter, you will get data for all previous versions.

filterGroupsUi.name: filterGroupsUi
filterGroupsUi.description: When multiple filters are provided within a filterGroup, they will be combined using a logical AND operator. When multiple filterGroups are provided, they will be combined using a logical OR operator. The system supports a maximum of three filterGroups with up to three filters each. More info here
filterGroupsUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filter Groups | 作用: When multiple filters are provided within a filterGroup, they will be combined using a logical AND operator. When multiple filterGroups are provided, they will be combined using a logical OR operator. The system supports a maximum of three filterGroups with up to three filters each. More info here | 默认值: {}

by.name: by
by.natural_language_description: 参数名: By | 默认值: email | (必填项)

id.name: id
id.natural_language_description: 参数名: Contact ID | (必填项)

listId.name: listId
listId.natural_language_description: 参数名: List ID | (必填项)

companyId.name: companyId
companyId.description: Unique identifier for a particular company
companyId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Company ID | 作用: Unique identifier for a particular company | (必填项)

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: associatedCompanyIds (值: None) - Companies associated with the ticket. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.
associatedContactIds (值: None) - Contact associated with the ticket. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.
category (值: None) - Main reason customer reached out for help. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
closeDate (值: None) - The date the ticket was closed
createDate (值: None) - The date the ticket was created
description (值: None) - Description of the ticket
pipelineId (值: None) - The ID of the pipeline the ticket is in. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
priority (值: None) - The level of attention needed on the ticket. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
resolution (值: None) - The action taken to resolve the ticket. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
source (值: None) - Channel where ticket was originally submitted. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
stageId (值: None) - The stage ID of the pipeline the ticket is in; depends on Pipeline ID. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
ticketName (值: None) - The ID of the pipeline the ticket is in

ticketOwnerId (值: None) - The user from your team that the ticket is assigned to. You can assign additional users to a ticket record by creating a custom HubSpot user property. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: properties (值: None) - Used to include specific company properties in the results. By default, the results will only include company ID and will not include the values for any properties for your company.Including this parameter will include the data for the specified property in the results. You can include this parameter multiple times to request multiple properties separated by a comma: `,`.. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

domain.name: domain
domain.description: The company's website domain to search for, like n8n.io
domain.natural_language_description: 参数名: Domain | 作用: The company's website domain to search for, like n8n.io | (必填项)

stage.name: stage
stage.description: The dealstage is required when creating a deal. See the CRM Pipelines API for details on managing pipelines and stages. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
stage.natural_language_description: 参数名: Deal Stage Name or ID | 作用: The dealstage is required when creating a deal. See the CRM Pipelines API for details on managing pipelines and stages. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

dealId.name: dealId
dealId.description: Unique identifier for a particular deal
dealId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Deal ID | 作用: Unique identifier for a particular deal | (必填项)

metadata.name: metadata
metadata.natural_language_description: 参数名: Metadata | 默认值: {}

engagementId.name: engagementId
engagementId.description: Unique identifier for a particular engagement
engagementId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Engagement ID | 作用: Unique identifier for a particular engagement | (必填项)

formId.name: formId
formId.description: The ID of the form. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
formId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Form Name or ID | 作用: The ID of the form. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

contextUi.name: contextUi
contextUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Context | 默认值: {}

lengalConsentUi.name: lengalConsentUi
lengalConsentUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Legal Consent | 默认值: {}

pipelineId.name: pipelineId
pipelineId.description: The ID of the pipeline the ticket is in. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
pipelineId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Pipeline Name or ID | 作用: The ID of the pipeline the ticket is in. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

stageId.name: stageId
stageId.description: The ID of the pipeline the ticket is in. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
stageId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Stage Name or ID | 作用: The ID of the pipeline the ticket is in. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

ticketName.name: ticketName
ticketName.description: The ID of the pipeline the ticket is in
ticketName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Ticket Name | 作用: The ID of the pipeline the ticket is in | (必填项)

ticketId.name: ticketId
ticketId.description: Unique identifier for a particular ticket
ticketId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Ticket ID | 作用: Unique identifier for a particular ticket | (必填项)
